results.name: Mega Man Star Force 2: Zerker x Ninja
Delta Force: Black Hawk Down Platinum Pack

requirements_en.minimum:
XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: Pentium II 450MHz or better
Memory: 128MB minimum
Graphics: Direct3D w/ 16MB or better
DirectX: DirectX version 6.0 or higher (included)
Hard Drive: 500MB Free
Sound: DirectX compliant
Mouse, Keyboard

Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: AMD Athlon 3500+ or Intel Pentium IV 3.4 Ghz
Memory: 1.5GB RAM, Graphics: Nvidia 6600 (256Mb) / ATI Radeon X700 (256Mb) DirectX: 9.0c or higher
Hard Drive: 8 Gb of free space
Sound: DirectX 9-compliant sound card
Mouse, Keyboard
Windows XP or Windows Vista, 1 GHz Processor (1.4 GHz recommended), 256MB RAM (512 recommended), 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 (compatible with DirectX 9 recommended), Mouse, Keyboard.

• OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista
  • Processor: 700 MHz CPU

  • Memory: 3 GB RAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, Win7
  • Processor: Pentium 4, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 768 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.3 Compatible with 128 MB RAM
  • Hard Drive: 360 MB Space Free
  • Sound: OpenAl compatible

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Additional Notes: Game may technically run on older/slower DirectX 9.0c video devices, but performance may not be acceptable.

Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 1.59, Ubuntu 14.10, Debian 8, Mint 17.1, Fedora 21.5, openSUSE 13.2 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only the above distros have been tested with Alarameth TD. Game may technically run on older/slower Pixel Shader Model 2 video devices but performance may not be acceptable.

  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
